name: Aardvark Attack
overview: An educational typing game created by Marc Sugiyama and published in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1983/11 (Issue #5). It was also translated to Dutch and released in Courbois Software #64s09. It's actually a "port" of a game released in the previous issue of the magazine (issue #4) for the VIC-20, although that was developed by Todd Heimarck.
